title: Itoshii Anoko Wo Metoritai
alternative_title: Itoshii Ano Kitsune o Metoritai ; Making My Little Fox Mine ; 想娶那只可爱狐狸 ; 愛しいあの狐を娶りたい
status: Itoshii Ano Kitsune o Metoritai ; Making My Little Fox Mine ; 想娶那只可爱狐狸 ; 愛しいあの狐を娶りたい
description:
Description :
        San is the only black fox in the pack and detested as a bearer of misfortunes to their village.One day while rescuing a cub caught in a trap, humans spot San and nearly shoot him. After he returns to his village, he is threatened with being kicked out.

Just then, a commanding voice rings out... and says it will marry him! The voice belongs to no other than the pack leader, the beautiful and prideful white fox, Kanae.

What is Kanae planning...? What will come of the unrequited love of this loyal but forthcoming and prideful pack leader and his detested and desolate black fox?
